attachments.fallback:
David Keatts commented on [low] In autocomplete, i tried getting to "crusade" but it wasn't showing up. If there is a card with an exact match, can we get that to show first?: "as far as I could figure out, there's no real way to do the "tokenizer" approach with the typeahead but also sort things the way we want, without building corejs-typeahead from source (no thanks).

so I got it sorting results, but it's now basically just one token, so "crusa" will match "crusade" and "crusader of odric" but not "cather's crusade"."
attachments.text:
as far as I could figure out, there's no real way to do the "tokenizer" approach with the typeahead but also sort things the way we want, without building corejs-typeahead from source (no thanks).

so I got it sorting results, but it's now basically just one token, so "crusa" will match "crusade" and "crusader of odric" but not "cather's crusade".

text: Something wrong with the numbers on ob site. Similar to other issue you had on the main site?
<@UJHPKDALB> log in trello plz
link?
Yeah i cant reproduce
it’s a firefox bug
I assumed you took that screenshot and found it in not-firefox though, but yeah nvm
I think this is the same issue that amurazi reported via email, right?
yeah, I’m pushing out a fix now
should I put a card in anyway?
nah, I just reproduced the issue and verified that the fix works, and it only takes 10 minutes to fully update oathbreaker

Also, suggestions from that batch of emails for Don:
-Deck-brewing competitions with various parameters (i.e. 5-10 rarely used cards)
-a separate part of the site that features Pauper commanders and/or a budget filter
-capacity to search cards by function (removal, ramp, etc)
-sort artifact lands as lands, not artifacts
-fix search issue with split cards; searching "Life" doesn't return Life // Death in the autocomplete menu, but searching "Life //" doesn't work
- include a "hidden gems" filter that filters out cards in more than 15% of decks, or in some specified percentage range
- add a utility artifact/mana rock grouping similar to the utility land one

Most of these seem like feature requests more than bug fixes, so I take it these are Don issues?
yeah, and split cards already has a few low priority trello cards
Oh ok yeah
That was the only one I wasn’t sure about
In terms of don issue vs. Dave issue

text: nice <@U28TLDP0R>
on the ads thing

> -Deck-brewing competitions with various parameters (i.e. 5-10 rarely used cards)

What the shit is this? i'm not sure i'd even respond to this

> -a separate part of the site that features Pauper commanders and/or a budget filter

Common suggestion. Not enough data. I've looked. If the format takes off then we'd be happy to add.

Filtering by budget on a page (i.e., only show me cards <$1) is a reasonably common ask, and we should do it one day but not soon.

> -capacity to search cards by function (removal, ramp, etc)

Suggest the go to scryfall and search by edhrec. "Function" is too ambiguous, and while i have an idea on how to crowdsouce this, it's not straightforward.


> -fix search issue with split cards; searching "Life" doesn't return Life // Death in the autocomplete menu, but searching "Life //" doesn't work

echoing keatts, check trello i think this might be in there. This is the sort of bug that will linger for a while since its not that widespread and its annoying AF.


> - include a "hidden gems" filter that filters out cards in more than 15% of decks, or in some specified percentage range

stupid idea. there are a lot of cards that are in a specified percentage range and most are garbage.

> - add a utility artifact/mana rock grouping similar to the utility land one

... decent idea... let's point nate at this one
<@U3MTAQBE1> thoughts on this utility artifact vs. mana rock

there are some borderline ones like [[Thought vessel]], but many of them like [[Chromatic Lantern]] and [[Coalition Relic]] and the signets, sol ring, mana crypt, mana vault, gildeed lotus, etc. only have the purpose of making mana
